title: Anthem Next Is Dead - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.25.21
description:
Go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code KFGD to get $25 off when you spend $100 or more, plus free shipping!

Go to http://burrow.com/games to get $75 off your first order!

For a limited time, visit http://logitechg.com and use code KindaFunnyDailyFreeShip222 for free express shipping, but hurry — this promo code expires in 5 days!

Iron Galaxy Co-CEO Chelsea Blasko joins Greg to talk about the death of Anthem Next, Halo coming to TV, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
There’s a PlayStation State of Play TODAY. We’ll be live and reacting to it at 2 pm PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames, but if you’re watching later, those reactions will be on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
We drafted a new FCF Team last night, and Saturday we take on the Zippers! Coverage starts at 4:30 p.m. pt on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - Anthem Next Is Dead, Christian Dailey @ BioWare
00:16:18 -  What’s Henry Cavill Doing with Mass Effect? Karol Laska @ Game Pressure
00:21:50 - It’s Real Bad over at CD Projekt, Jason @ Bloomberg
00:30:30 -  Ad
00:35:32 - Bravely Default 2 Review Round-up
00:38:55 - Amazon Luna Boss Bounces, @Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:40:20 - Is now the time to consider game streaming dead? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:43:20 - Pokemon Presentation Tomorrow
00:43:55 - Halo TV Series Moves to Paramount+, Nellie Andreeva @ Deadline
00:49:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:53:30 - I've just logged into Bloodborne (chasing the platinum) and was met with a message that servers will be down for several hours for essential maintenance on Tuesday morning. With a State of Play imminent, is this a reason to get excited for a 4k/60fps patch, or just a coincidence?  - Katie G
00:54:53 - Squad Up:Tyler Fisher(Pokémon Go) TJFtheGREAT
00:56:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

but then jason gets into more of it as a result of the ransomware attack which was discovered disclosed on february 9th most of its employees have been locked out of their workstations for the past two weeks according to people familiar with the matter the polish company had planned to release a patch to fix bugs and other issues in the game this month but quote the recent cyber attack on the studio's it infrastructure and extensive scope of the update mean this unfortunately will not happen end quote the company said in a tweet it now aims to release the patch in the second half of march the work stoppage poses a major setback to cd projekt's attempt to rescue a game in desperate need of repairs cd projekt red said it refused to pay a ransom pay a ransom to the hackers and it has cut off remote access to internal network resources and isolated the internal network from the internet according to statement from the company to former employees on february 17th as a result employees
